# File lib/ramaze/helper/paginate.rb, line 54
      def paginate(dataset, options = {})
        options = ancestral_trait[:paginate].merge(options)
        limit = options[:limit]
        var   = options[:var]
        page  = options[:page] || (request[var] || 1).to_i

        Paginator.new(dataset, page, limit, var)
      end
